title: #1486 More Safe Spaces & More Octagons
itunes:title: #1486 More Safe Spaces & More Octagons
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show with Adam asking Drew about a rash that has been developing on his forearm that he's trying to figure out that Drew surmises might be poison oak. The conversation then turns to politics as Dr. Drew attempts to explore the phenomenon of cycles in our political system. The conversation then turns to Sanjay Gupta's recent appearance on The Joe Rogan Experience where he was measured and reasonable only to go on Don Lemons' show a short time later and revert back to obfuscating the truth. 

Please Support Our Sponsors:
TommyJohn.com/ADS
Babbel.com, promo code ADS
Lifelock.com, promo code ADAM
